articles.title: Military Attaches Corps Visits Fishery Station and Fruit Farm
articles.content:
Military Attaches Corps Visits Fishery Station and Fruit Farm
 Wonsan, August 22 (KCNA) -- The military attaches corps here Friday visited the January 8 Fishery Station of the Korean People's Army  (KPA) on the occasion of the 54th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 The guests cruised to watch the latest-type fishing boats and other up-to-date harbor facilities and fishermen's hostel built under the energetic leadership and loving care of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 They expressed deep admiration at the fact that the service personnel of the KPA successfully completed in a matter of a few months the huge project which would take several years at an ordinary pace by giving full play to the indomitable fighting spirit and heroic stamina.
					
					 Hassan Reza Husseini, military attache of the Iranian embassy who is doyen of the corps, said after visiting the station that it has been built into a modern fishing base under the energetic guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un who is paying deep attention to the fishery field.
					
					 Kim Jong Un who has pursued a policy of respecting and loving the people has shown all sorts of loving care for the fishermen, having a photo taken with them, he noted.
					
					 He hoped that the employees of the station would register great successes in making big fish hauls.
					
					Earlier, they visited the Kosan Fruit Farm and the Wire Net Factory where they went round different production processes.

articles.title: Seminar of Agricultural Workers Held
articles.content:
Seminar of Agricultural Workers Held
 Pyongyang, August 22 (KCNA) -- There took place a seminar of officials of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea (UAWK) and agricultural workers at the People's Palace of Culture on Friday on the occasion of the 54th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 Present at the seminar were officials concerned, officials of the UAWK and agricultural workers.
					
					 Speeches were made by Ri Myong Gil, chairman of the Central Committee of the UAWK, and Ho Tok Bok, chairperson of the Pyongyang City Committee of the union.
					
					 Speakers said Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership at the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su  Guards 105th Tank Division of the Korean People's Army on August 25, Juche 49 (1960) marked a historic event which declared the succession to the revolutionary cause of Songun and the fresh start of his Songun leadership. 
					
					 After adopting the Songun politics as a main political mode under socialism, Kim Jong Il set up a new state machinery with the National Defence Commission as its pivot and thus wisely led all state affairs in such a manner that they were administered on the principle of giving precedence to military affairs, the speakers recalled, adding:
					
					 Thanks to Songun, the service personnel and people of the DPRK could reliably defend the country, revolution and gains of socialism by their own efforts and with their arms, the prosperity of the country was brought about and a rosy future of the nation carved out.
					
					 Thanks to the exploits he performed by laying a solid foundation for carrying forward and implementing the Juche-oriented revolutionary cause of Songun which started in Mt. Paektu, they are now vigorously advancing toward the final victory in the drive for the building of a thriving nation under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 The speakers underlined the need for all the officials of the union and agricultural workers to accomplish generation after generation the revolutionary cause of Juche which was pioneered and advanced by dint of Songun, united close around Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Taedong River Crossing Competition Held
articles.content:
Taedong River Crossing Competition Held
 Pyongyang, August 22 (KCNA) -- Youth and students in Pyongyang held a Taedong River crossing competition on Friday on the occasion of the 54th anniversary of the Day of Songun.
					 It brought together more than 1,100 boys and girls selected from universities and schools in districts and counties of the city.
					
					 After the kick-off ceremony was held on the bank of the River Taedong in front of Kim Il Sung Square, students of Changgwang Senior Secondary School and Songyo District Namsin Primary School made a demonstration crossing the river.
					
					 Then followed a river crossing competition.
					
					 School youth and children and citizens applauded the students crossing the river, displaying high swimming technique, strong willpower and team spirit.
					
					 Pyongyang University of Printing and Tongdaewon District place first in the competition.

articles.title: Foreign Crewmen Observe Important Day of DPRK
articles.content:
Foreign Crewmen Observe Important Day of DPRK
 Wonsan, August 22 (KCNA) -- There took place a meeting of foreign crewmen at Wonsan Port, Kangwon Province on Friday to mark the 54th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 Participants in the meeting laid a bouquet before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in Wonsan City and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Present at the meeting were the captain and crewmen of Dong Feng 6.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 Speakers recalled that Kim Jong Il worked heart and soul to bolster up the defence capability of the country, making ceaseless journeys to inspect forefront units including those on Chol Pass and Mt. Osong despite rain or snow to protect the destiny of the country and its people.
					
					 He built invincible military muscle and achieved great army-people unity with his outstanding idea and through his wise leadership for over half a century, thus successfully leading the struggle for defending socialism and building a thriving nation, they noted, adding:
					
					 The Songun politics of the DPRK is now being carried forward and developed on a fresh higher stage by Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Thanks to his profound loving care, the Korean people invariably remain true to the idea and intention of Kim Jong Il and the revolutionary ranks are growing stronger as the most genuine and solid harmonious whole.
					
					 Only victory and glory will be in store for the service personnel and people of the DPRK who are advancing under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Un's Work on Songun Revolution
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Un's Work on Songun Revolution
 Pyongyang, August 22 (KCNA) -- It is one year since Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, made public his work "Let Us Add Eternal Brilliance to Comrade Kim Jong Il's Great Idea and Achievements of the Songun Revolution" to mark the Day of Songun (Aug. 25).
					 The work comprehends Generalissimo Kim Jong Il's idea and theory on the Songun (army-first) revolution.
					
					 Kim Jong Il in his lifetime had made a history of victories and glory for the country, regarding the Songun idea as his steadfast principle. During his Songun revolutionary guidance, he formulated and developed in depth the Songun idea to provide the guidelines that should be adhered to in accomplishing the cause of independence.
					
					 In the work, Kim Jong Un clarified that the idea of the Songun revolution calls for giving priority to the military affairs in accomplishing the popular masses' cause of independence, the cause of socialism, and pushing forward the revolution and construction as a whole with the revolutionary army as core forces. And he stressed that Kim Jong Il's Songun idea is the revolutionary and scientific idea and theory as it is consistent with the transparent anti-imperialist independent stand and warm love for the country and the nation and the popular masses and based on the iron faith and will and makes it possible to perfectly and comprehensively meet the demands of the Juche idea.
					
					 Basing himself on such scientific analysis of the Songun idea, he elucidated the validity and originality of the Songun politics and its invincible vitality.
					
					 With this work of Kim Jong Un, the feats performed by Kim Jong Il in leading the Songun revolution will be kept deeper in the minds of the Korean people and the world progressives.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats for Songun Revolution
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats for Songun Revolution
 Pyongyang, August 22 (KCNA) -- Every year the army and people in the DPRK significantly celebrate August 25 as the Day of Songun (military- first).
					 On August 25, Juche 49 (1960) leader Kim Jong Il started his Songun revolutionary leadership, with inspection of the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su Guards 105th Tank Division of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 Since then, he had made ceaseless inspection of military units and posts for 50-odd years despite weather conditions, turning the KPA into an invincible Paektusan army.
					
					 In the mid-1990s when the country was at the crossroads of its destiny, he held higher the banner of the Songun politics and formulated it as the basic mode of politics under socialism to defend the destiny of the country and people.
					
					 For 17 years from January 1, 1995 when he visited the dwarf pine post to the last moments of his life, Generalissimo Kim Jong Il inspected more than 2,490 military units in total.
					
					 His energetic Songun guidance put the dignity and strength of the DPRK on the highest level.
					
					 The feats he performed in leading the Songun revolution will remain forever along with history of the DPRK.

articles.title: Swedish Delegation Tours Various Places
articles.content:
Swedish Delegation Tours Various Places
 Pyongyang, August 22 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Institute for Security and Development Policy of Sweden led by Director Niklas Swanstrom visited the Tower of the Juche Idea.
					 Being briefed on the grand monument of the times which conveys long the ideological and theoretical feats of President Kim Il Sung who founded the immortal Juche idea, the guests went round the tower and groups of sculptures. On the observation platform they enjoyed a birth's-eye view of Pyongyang.
					
					 The delegation also visited the Songdowon International Children's Camp, the Munsu Water Park and other places.

articles.title: Sports Teams in DPRK Apply New Training Methods
articles.content:
Sports Teams in DPRK Apply New Training Methods
 Pyongyang, August 22 (KCNA) -- The Sports Team under the Ministry of Land and Marine Transport in the DPRK has introduced new methods to train players in various events.
					 It applied new teaching and training methods properly in keeping with the specific features of events and each player's physical conditions and technical standards and special skills.
					
					 As a result, its athletes have proved successful in national tournaments. 
					
					 This year the team bagged four cups and 50-odd gold medals at the Mangyongdae Prize Sports Games. It also won more than 140 medals in the Sports Contest for Jonsung Cup, including nearly 50 gold medals in such events as boating, canoe, synchronized swimming, sailboat and water skiing.

articles.title: Carbon-Sulfur High-speed Analyzer Developed in DPRK
articles.content:
Carbon-Sulfur High-speed Analyzer Developed in DPRK
 Pyongyang, August 22 (KCNA) -- Scientists in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea developed a carbon-sulfur high-speed analyzer for estimating the quality of ferrous metal products.
					 This computer-controlled analyzer makes it possible to analyze a piece of coupon in one minute without few errors.
					
					 It has been already applied in the country's metallurgical industrial sector to pay off.

articles.title: DPRK Products Win Popularity at Int'l Trade Exhibition
articles.content:
DPRK Products Win Popularity at Int'l Trade Exhibition
 Pyongyang, August 22 (KCNA) -- Products from the DPRK won popularity at the 4th Rason International Trade Exhibition.
					 Those products, presented by 20 companies, include fur goods, fine art works, handicrafts, different kinds of drinks made with natural vegetables and garments.
					
					 The Rajin Drink Factory displayed Paekhwa Liquor, brewed with 100 species of flowers, which is very good for health as it contains rich amino acids and vitamins.
					
					 The Rason Samdaesong J.V. Company exhibited various trucks.
					
					 Pak Yong Gun, president of the company, told KCNA:
					
					 My company manufactures various types of trucks. It also produces containers and others by itself.
					
					 We will boost production to the maximum by introducing streamlined process.
					
					 Among the popular products were also tens of kinds of health foods, made of edible herbs, wild fruits and honey.

articles.title: North-South Agreements Are Not Plaything of Warmaniacs: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
North-South Agreements Are Not Plaything of Warmaniacs: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, August 22 (KCNA) -- The on-going large-scale joint military exercises targeting the north are a wanton violation of the north-south agreements fully hailed and supported at home and abroad and whose validity and vitality have been clearly proved in practice as they reflect the general will of the whole nation. Rodong Sinmun Friday says this in an article.
					 The north-south agreements, the reunification programmes common to the nation, are not poor documents which can be twisted whenever regimes are replaced by new ones just as swindlers break their promises, but the sacred treasures of the nation for the country's reunification, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 Turning one's face away from the north-south agreements and refusing to implement them is an unpardonable treacherous act of seeking confrontation with fellow countrymen and the unification of the social systems, not national reconciliation, unity and independent reunification.
					
					 In the past the north and the south of Korea provided good principles and agreements for national reunification and unity including the historic July 4 joint statement, the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration.
					
					 If the agreements common to the nation adopted by the top leaders of the north and the south are reduced to dead papers and abused to meet the partisan interests and strategy, what is the use of reaching an agreement between the authorities even a hundred times.
					
					 Reneging on the north-south agreements is an unbearable mockery and insult to the Korean nation desirous of the country's reunification and, at the same time, an act of treachery bereft of elemental faith.
					
					 Implementing the north-south agreements precisely means improving the inter-Korean relations, and denying this means confrontation and war.
					
					 If the south Korean authorities deny the July 4 joint statement, the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and lay a stumbling block in the way of implementing them while staging the madcap joint military exercises targeting the north, they will not be able to escape the curse and denunciation of all fellow countrymen but, in the long run, will meet a ruin.

articles.title: US "Strategic Patience Policy" on Chopping Board: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
US "Strategic Patience Policy" on Chopping Board: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, August 22 (KCNA) -- U.S. congressmen are now becoming increasingly vocal blaming the administration for its Korea policy failure, terming strategic patience "fence sitting policy." All who claim to be experts on Korean affairs are vying with each other to underline the need to make a switchover in the U.S. hostile policy towards the DPRK.
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday observes in an article in this regard:
					
					 Every politician responsible for the destiny of the U.S. should properly understand who its rival is, though belatedly, and had better stop going reckless. 
					
					 Since the emergence of the Obama Administration, it has pursued a "strategic patience policy" that the U.S. waits for the DPRK to yield to it after ceasing all its nuclear activities and dismantling its nukes, and resorted to sanctions and pressure upon the DPRK in denial of any dialogue with it.
					
					 The DPRK's  decision to have access to nuclear deterrence was an option it was compelled to take in face of the U.S. hostile policy, ceaseless military pressure and nuclear threat that have lasted for more than half a century since its foundation.
					
					 Taking issue with the DPRK's launch of satellites for peaceful purposes and politicizing and internationalizing it, the U.S. slapped collective sanctions against the DPRK by mobilizing its allies.
					
					 Kicking off hysteria over every trifling move of the DPRK, the U.S. wooed the UN Security Council into issuing what it called "statements".
					
					 As the U.S. clarified its stand to bring down the social system in the DPRK at any cost, brandishing its nuclear club, the DPRK had no choice but to react to the U.S. nukes in kind.
					
					 The nukes of the DPRK are deterrence for self-defense to be maintained and bolstered up till the U.S. nuclear threat and blackmail are terminated. They are, at the same time, just treasured sword to break the cursed nuclear club of the U.S. and establish an international fair order.
					
					 The U.S. was chiefly to blame for compelling the DPRK to have access to nukes though it was keen to focus its efforts on economic construction and the improvement of the people's standard of living. With nothing can the U.S. block the advance of the DPRK.

articles.title: De-nationalization of Healthcare Opposed in S. Korea
articles.content:
De-nationalization of Healthcare Opposed in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, August 22 (KCNA) -- The Headquarters of the All-People Movement for Checking De-nationalization of Healthcare of south Korea held a press conference outside Chongwadae on August 19 denouncing the puppet authorities for trying to de-nationalize healthcare, according to Voice of People, an internet paper of south Korea.
					 At the press conference speakers condemned the authorities for more undisguisedly pushing forward the de-nationalization of healthcare by announcing that they would additionally ease restrictions in the field of healthcare.
					
					 This is a dangerous policy of reducing healthcare to a means of capitalists for seeking profits, they charged.
					
					 To ease restrictions in the field of healthcare will cause the second ferry Sewol disaster, they held.
					
					 Recalling that two million people signed papers in protest against the de-nationalization of healthcare, they urged the regime to respond to their demand. 
					
					 If the authorities push forward the de-nationalization of healthcare, the organization will stage a dynamic action to put an end to de-nationalization, including workers' general strike and an all-people rally, they warned.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Political Camp Accused of Its Deceptive Action
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Political Camp Accused of Its Deceptive Action 
 Pyongyang, August 22 (KCNA) -- Voice of People, an internet paper of south Korea in an editorial on August 20 accused the puppet political camp of its deceptive action.
					 The agreement reached again between the ruling and opposition parties on August 19 over the institution of a special law on probing the truth about the ferry Sewol disaster is also touching off opposition among the bereaved families, the editorial said.
					
					 The bereaved families have always held that the fact-finding committee should have the rights to investigate and indict those responsible for the disaster, it said, charging that the current agreement is no better than the preceding one in essence and falls short of meeting the demand raised by the bereaved families.
					
					 It expressed resentment at the political camp which deceived the people again.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Accused of Opening Rice Market
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Accused of Opening Rice Market
 Pyongyang, August 22 (KCNA) -- At least 1 000 peasants belonging to the Federation of Women Peasants Associations of south Korea held a rally at Seoul Square on August 20 in protest against the puppet authorities' moves to open the rice market, according to Voice of People, an internet paper of south Korea.
					 At the rally speakers denounced the "government" for unilaterally declaring on July 18 the total opening of the rice market without an agreement with the people.
					
					 In the past the "government" indiscriminately opened the farm produce market, driving the agriculture into a bankruptcy and putting the life of not only peasants but other people in destitution, they charged.
					
					 If the "government" totally opens the rice market, this will trigger off a disaster much bigger than the ferry Sewol sinking accident, they warned.
					
					 They declared that if the authorities do not retract the decision on totally opening the rice market, they would launch a strong action for the resignation of the regime.
					
					 At the end of the rally the participants staged a demo.

articles.title: Chongryon Officials Denounce UFG
articles.content:
Chongryon Officials Denounce UFG
 Tokyo, August 21 (KNS-KCNA) -- Officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) released statements on August 20 denouncing the U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet forces for kicking off Ulji Freedom Guardian, the reckless nuclear war exercises.
					 Kim Yong Ju, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Youth League in Japan, said that the U.S. and south Korean puppet warmongers kicked off the nuclear war exercises to which they formally applied the "tailored deterrence strategy" which calls for mounting a preemptive nuclear attack on the DPRK, increasing the danger of a nuclear war.
					
					 Kim Jong Su, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the Union of Korean Writers and Artists in Japan, resolutely denounced UFG kicked off by the U.S. and south Korean puppet warmongers as acts against the nation, reunification and peace.
					
					 Pu Yong Uk, chairperson of the Osaka Prefectural Headquarters of Chongryon, said that the situation on the Korean peninsula is getting tenser and the aspiration and wishes of the fellow countrymen for the improved north-south relations are facing grave difficulties due to the north-targeted nuclear war exercises kicked off by the U.S. and the south Korean puppet warmongers.
					
					 Mun Kwang Hui, chairperson of the Aichi Prefectural Headquarters of Chongryon, fully supported the invariable stand of the DPRK that it would take stronger military counteractions against the aggressors and resolutely punish the provocateurs.
					
					 Jon To Hyon, chairperson of the Miyagi Prefectural Headquarters of Chongryon, said that compatriots under the headquarters would turn out in the dynamic movement to put an end to the division of the country, the root cause of misfortune and pain of the nation.

articles.title: Anniversary of Korea's Liberation Celebrated in Brazil, Nigeria
articles.content:
Anniversary of Korea's Liberation Celebrated in Brazil, Nigeria
 Pyongyang, August 22 (KCNA) -- Brazilian and Nigerian organizations posted special write-ups on their websites on Aug. 15 on the occasion of the 69th anniversary of Korea's liberation. 
					              The Brazilian Committee for Solidarity with the DPRK posted an article titled "President Kim Il Sung, benefactor of liberation" illustrated with his photo.
					
					 The Korean nation was subject to the colonial slavery in the first half of the last century and the Japanese imperialists perpetrated thrice-cursed atrocities against humanity after occupying Korea by force of arms, the article said, and went on:
					
					 It was Kim Il Sung who liberated the Korean nation.
					
					 His exploits are always remembered by the Korean people and progressive humankind.
					
					 The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism posted an article entitled "Songun leadership and liberation of Korea". 
					
					 The article noted that Kim Il Sung, founder of socialist Korea, accomplished the historic cause of national liberation with his Songun leadership, adding that his feats would go down in the world history of the anti-imperialist national liberation struggle.

articles.title: DPRK's Important Days Marked in Brazil, Germany
articles.content:
DPRK's Important Days Marked in Brazil, Germany
 Pyongyang, August 22 (KCNA) -- There took place a book exhibition and round-table talks in Brazil and a meeting in Germany on Aug. 13 and 14. They marked the Day of Songun in the DPRK and the 69th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 Displayed there were photos documenting the exploits of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also on display were their works and books introducing Songun Korea.
					
					 A vice-president of the Party for Free Motherland of Brazil said the DPRK advancing towards a thriving socialist nation would be unthinkable without such national historic event as Korea's liberation.
					
					 The exploits by Kim Il Sung, benefactor of the liberation of the Korean nation, would always be remembered not only by the Korean people but by progressive mankind.
					
					 The chairman of the Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany said in a speech:
					
					 The new history of Korea has begun since Kim Il Sung liberated the country 69 years ago. 
					
					 The DPRK has won victories in the confrontation with the U.S. because HE Kim Jong Il, faithful successor to the idea and cause of Kim Il Sung, built powerful capability for self-defence with his Songun revolutionary leadership.
					
					 Kim Jong Un is further developing the DPRK into an invincible military power. It greatly encourages the progressive people in their struggle against imperialism.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the event in Germany.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats Lauded by Bangladeshi, Ethiopian Personages
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats Lauded by Bangladeshi, Ethiopian Personages
 Pyongyang, August 22 (KCNA) -- The Bangladesh Group for the Study of Songun Policy held a seminar and a design supervisory office of Oromia Province, Ethiopia round-table talks on August 15 and 17. They marked the Day of Songun in the DPRK.
					 Displayed there were photos documenting the Songun leadership feats of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 A reporter and speakers including the chairman of the Bangladesh group said that Kim Jong Il started the Songun revolutionary leadership by visiting the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su Guards 105th Tank Division of the Korean People's Army on August 25, 1960, an event of great historical significance.
					
					 Under his Songun leadership the DPRK has always won victory in the confrontation with the U.S., they noted, praising him for establishing the Songun politics as the basic political mode under socialism and bringing about great miracles and changes in the defense of the country and socialist construction.
					
					 They were convinced that thanks to the Songun politics the Korean people would smash the moves of the U.S. imperialists to stifle the DPRK, firmly protect the sovereignty and dignity of the country and nation and socialism and build a thriving nation without fail.
					
					 The chief for irrigation of the above-said office of Ethiopia and other speakers said the DPRK turned into a military power thanks to Kim Jong Il's Songun revolutionary leadership and that the world recognizes the powerful military muscle of the DPRK and all countries should learn from its Songun politics.

articles.title: Songdowon Children's Camp Introduced by Nigerian Organization
articles.content:
Songdowon Children's Camp Introduced by Nigerian Organization
 Pyongyang, August 22 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism on August 15 posted on its website an article introducing the Songdowon International Children's Camp.
					 The article said:
					
					 The Songdowon International Children's Camp looks like a beautiful picture. It well matches the landscape of Songdowon having a vast expanse of beach and a thick woodland of pine trees on the scenic east coast of Korea.
					
					 It draws particular attention of the international community not merely because of its fantastic scenery. It is more interested in stirring reality of the DPRK which regards children as the king of the country and translates all their dreams into realities.
					
					 What should be mentioned first is the fact that campers are provided with everything in the modern camp free of charge.
					
					 What is worth mentioning next is the fact that children of workers, peasants, coal miners and other ordinary working people and even orphans go to this wonderful camp to which only children of millionaires and privileged circles can go in other countries.
					
					 What should be mentioned last is the fact that all this is the embodiment and fruition of the consistent and steadfast line and policies of the party and the government.
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un in his speech at the event for celebrating the 66th anniversary of the Korean Children's Union in June, 2012 said that for the Workers' Party of Korea and the DPRK the members of the KCU are the most precious treasures and they all represent the hope and future.
					
					 Kim Jong Un, possessed of such noble love for the younger generation, initiated the remodeling of the camp and took all measures, while providing a series of field guidance, to successfully build it into a world first-class camp.
					
					 The camp is, indeed, is the children's palace and a paradise without an equal in the world.

articles.title: Tiene lugar seminario de funcionarios y trabajadores agricolas
articles.content:
Tiene lugar seminario de funcionarios y trabajadores agricolas
Pyongyang, 22 de agosto (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 54o aniversario del inicio de la direccion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun tuvo lugar el dia 22 en el Palacio Cultural del Pueblo el seminario de los funcionarios de la Union de Trabajadores Agricolas y trabajadores agricolas.
					Participaron en la ocasion los funcionarios de la rama interesada y de la UTA y trabajadores agricolas.
					
					Intervinieron el presidente del CC de la UTA, Ri Myong Gil, el presidente de la UTA en la ciudad de Pyongyang, Ho Tok Bok y otros.
					
					Los oradores senalaron que el Dirigente dejo el dia 25 de agosto del 49 (1960) de la Era Juche en la Division Guardia de Tanques 105 "Seul" Ryu Kyong Su, su primera huella de direccion, lo cual fue un evento historico que declaro la continuacion de la causa de la revolucion del Songun y nueva partida de la direccion de Songun.
					
					Subrayaron que el Dirigente definio la politica de Songun como el modo principal de la politica del socialismo, establecio el nuevo sistema de administracion estatal cuyo nucleo es el Comite de Defensa Nacional y dirigio  sabiamente para que todas las labores del Estado se realicen en los principios de dar prioridad a los asuntos militares.
					
					Enfatizaron que gracias a Songun, el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea pueden defender fidedignamente con sus fuerzas y fusiles la patria, la revolucion y las conquistas socialistas y lograr la prosperidad del pais y acoger el radiante porvenir de la nacion.
					
					Destacaron que por las hazanas del Dirigente quien preparo firme base por la continuacion de la causa revolucionaria del Songun iniciada en el monte Paektu, el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea avanzan firmemente hacia la victoria final de la construccion de un Estado prospero bajo la direccion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					
					Finalizaron que todos los funcionarios de la UTA y los trabajadores agricolas deben llevar a feliz termino de generacion en generacion la causa revolucionaria del Juche iniciada y avanzada con el Songun uniendose firmemente en torno al Mariscal.

articles.title: Productos de RPDC presentados en exposicion internacional de mercancias de Rason
articles.content:
Productos de RPDC presentados en exposicion internacional de mercancias de Rason
Pyongyang, 22 de agosto (ACNC) -- En la 4a Exposicion Internacional de Mercancias de Rason los articulos de 20 companias de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea llamaron atencion de los visitantes.
					 Entre ellos figuran los productos de piel, obras de bellas artes, bordados y productos de artes menores, ropas y bebidas de varios generos elaboradas con plantas naturales.
					
					  El abrigo y la bufanda de pie de conejo y otros productos de piel, presentados por la Compania Comercial General 28 de Agosto de Corea, gozan de buena reputacion de los compradores por su comodidad, suavidad, buena propiedad de aislamiento termico, formas variadas y colores elegantes.
					
					  La Compania Comercial Wisong de Rason presento los productos de artesania hechos con plumas de gaviota, faisan, etc. y otros materiales naturales.
					
					  La Fabrica de Bebidas de Rajin exhibio los productos de bebidas de mas de 10 especies.
					
					  El licor Paekhwa hecho con cien flores contiene el aminoacido y vitaminas de varias especies, etc. y es bueno para la salud de los hombres.
					
					La Fabrica de Confeccion de Ropas Sonbong expuso los productos de 15 generos como ropas enguatadas y chalecos, pantalones y uniformes deportivos para alpinistas. 
					
					La Compania Comanditaria Samdaesong de Rason presento los camiones de carga. 
					
					El director Pak Yong Gun dijo que su compania monto los camiones de carga de diversas formas. 
					
					Mi compania produce por propia cuenta los contenedores y cajas y vende los camiones en varios lugares del pais, senalo y expuso la decision de aumentar la produccion aplicando el proceso de produccion en cadena. 
					
					Ademas, decenas de alimentos para longevidad, elaborados con la miel, Ganoderma lucidum, helecho, Codonopsis lanceolada, Aster scaber, cambronera y otras hierbas comestibles y frutas silvestres ganan gran reputacion entre los extranjeros.

articles.title: Ejercicios militares conjuntos anti-RPDC son desafio a acuerdos N-S, destaca Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Ejercicios militares conjuntos anti-RPDC son desafio a acuerdos N-S, destaca Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 22 de agosto (ACNC) -- Los ejercicios militares conjuntos de gran envergadura contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea son el desafio a los acuerdos Norte-Sur de Corea que reflejan la voluntad unanime de toda la nacion coreana y manifiestan claramente en la realidad su justicia y vitalidad con la entera aplaudida interior y exterior.
					Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual difundido este viernes y continua:
					
					Los acuerdos N-S, programa de la nacion comun por la reunificacion, no son los documentos frusleros que se puedan revolcar a su gusto cada vez que se cambie el "poder" sino el sagrado patrimonio de la nacion por la reunificacion de la patria.
					
					Dar espaldas a los acuerdos N-S y negar la ejecucion de estos son imperdonables actos traidores a la nacion que persiguen la confrontacion fratricida y la unificacion mediante la fusion de regimenes en contra de  la reconciliacion y la unidad de la nacion y la reunificacion independiente.
					
					En el pasado, el Norte y el Sur de Corea prepararon magnificos principios y acuerdos para realizar la reunificacion del pais y la unidad de la nacion incluyendo las historicas Declaraciones Conjuntas del 4 de Julio y del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre.
					
					Si los acuerdos de la nacion comun firmados por los maximos dirigentes N-S son invalidos y abusados de la victima de intereses y estrategias fraccionales cada vez que se cambie el "poder" no haran falta los acuerdos de las autoridades de ambas partes coreanas aunque firmen cien veces.
					
					Revolcar los acuerdos N-S es la imperdonable burla a la nacion coreana que desea la reunificacion de la patria y el acto traidor a la nacion carente de confianza elemental.
					
					La ejecucion de los acuerdos N-S significa el mejoramiento de las relaciones intercoreanas y la negacion a estos es la confrontacion y la guerra.
					
					Si las autoridades surcoreanas niegan la historica Declaracion Conjunta del 4 de Julio, la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre y crean graves obstaculos en el proceso de su ejecucion librando freneticamente los ejercicios militares conjuntos anti-RPDC no podran evitar la condena de todos los coreanos y por fin, probaran la verguenza de derrota.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun burla "politica de paciencia estrategica" de EE.UU.
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun burla "politica de paciencia estrategica" de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 22 de agosto (ACNC) -- En el interior del congreso estadounidense se alzan las voces de criticas a la fracasada politica sobre la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea calificando la paciencia estrategica de "politica observadora". 
					Los hombres autodenominados como especialistas en los asuntos de Corea insisten en la necesidad de cambio de la politica norteamericana de hostilidad a la RPDC. 
					
					Los politicos, que se responsabilizan del destino de EE.UU., deben actuar con prudencia viendo correctamente a su rival, advierte el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual de este viernes y continua: 
					
					Despues de tomar el poder, la administracion Obama vino recurriendo a la "politica de paciencia estrategica". Esperando que la RPDC renunciara todas las actividades nucleares, dejo de hacer el dialogo con ella y le ejercio la sancion y la presion. 
					
					La RPDC se vio obligada a preparar el disuasivo nuclear por no poder sufrir por mas tiempo la politica hostil, la incesante presion militar y la amenaza nuclear de EE.UU. de mas de medio siglo. 
					
					El imperio politizo e internacionalizo el lanzamiento de satelite con fines pacificos de la RPDC e instigo hasta sus fuerzas satelites a ejercer la sancion colectiva sobre la RPDC. 
					
					Y critico en el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU los movimientos de nuestro pais y aprobo hasta la "declaracion" anti-RPDC. 
					
					Dado que es invariable el intento de EE.UU. de derrocar a toda costa a la RPDC con el garrote nuclear, no tenemos otro remedio mas que responderle con armas nucleares. 
					
					Las armas nucleares de la RPDC constituyen el disuasivo de autodefensa a ser mantenido y consolidado hasta cuando se eliminen la amenaza y chantaje nucleares de EE.UU. y resultan el remedio de justicia para acabar con la amenaza nuclear de EE.UU. y establecer el otro orden mundial imparcial. 
					
					La RPDC desarrollo las armas nucleares antes de concentrarse en la construccion economica  y en el mejoramiento de las condiciones de vida del pueblo. 
					
					EE.UU. no puede detener con nada el avance de la RPDC.
